title: Collaboration Role Changed
description: Fires when a member's role is changed within a workspace.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace where the role change occurred.

previousRole.description: The role the member held before the change.

newRole.description: The role assigned to the member after the change.

memberId.description: The unique identifier of the member whose role was changed.

changedBy.description: The unique identifier of the user who initiated the role change.
